price: Dan janganlah kamu berdebat (untuk membela) orang-orang yang mengkhianati dirinya.  Sesungguhnya Allah tidak menyukai orang-orang yang selalu berkhianat lagi bergelimang dosa,
arabic: وَلَا تُجَٰدِلۡ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡتَانُونَ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَن كَانَ خَوَّانًا أَثِيمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tujādil ʿani alladhīna yakhtānūna anfusahum inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu man kāna khawwānan athīman
